item.description:
Meet up at the track as usual. Tonight, we'll have a special workout. Our runners and friends will want to spend some time together to remember yesterdays tragic event. We want to know you're okay and we want to let everyone know that we're okay.

See you at the track.

Andy
item.how_to_find_us: We're always outside with clothes on...clothing optional.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: #TMIRCEtrack still on.
